creator: dhc4z@virginia.edu
text: It doesn't look like the insert link usecase (for bxe) has been created yet

creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
Do you mean the functionality to insert an internal link?

I just tried it:

  - click "Globe+Chain" icon in BXE
  - sitetree window pops up
  - link can be inserted
  - link appears after saving

I get "The requested document does not exist" error instead of the sitetree
window when I try on my instalation and when I try it on the demo:
http://lenya.zones.apache.org:9999/default/authoring/tutorial.html?&lenya.event=edit&lenya.usecase=edit.bxe
creator: dhc4z@virginia.edu
dhc4z@virginia.edu
text: Shouldn't we be using kupu drawers for adding links in bitflux?
This has been fixed a while ago, sorry for not closing this out sooner
creator: dhc4z@virginia.edu
